summary: I’ve been using various iterations of the Google Pixel Buds for a few years now, and have generally been happy with them, but the one exception was the Pixel Buds Pro.  I disliked them for a single, simple reason: They wouldn’t stay in my ears.  My ear shape and musculature are apparently designed to take […]
title: Spot Review of the Pixel Buds Pro 2

summary: I can't help myself, when I hear an English accent I automatically orientate towards the person speaking.  And, usually, because I make eye contact and smile, get a response.  And thus I start either a brief chat with another English speaker, sharing a few moments...
title: Bonjour, Hello
